message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is really my bottom line.  I know it's a great product that will really benefit you. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I still believe $15,000 is the most I can afford. I'm willing to increase my offer to $16,000 if that helps us move closer to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for coming up a bit. I'm willing to come down slightly as well. How about $17,000 and we have a deal?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm willing to increase my offer to $16,500. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
